urls.title: URLs to Process
urls.description: List of URLs to convert to LLM-ready format

useReaderLM.title: Use ReaderLM-v2 (Higher Quality)
useReaderLM.description: Use advanced ReaderLM-v2 model for better quality. WARNING: Consumes 3x tokens. Best for complex pages with tables, code, nested lists.

generateImageAlt.title: Generate Image Alt Text
generateImageAlt.description: Automatically generate descriptive alt text for images using vision models

timeout.title: Page Load Timeout (ms)
timeout.description: Maximum time to wait for page rendering. Higher values capture more dynamic content.

noCache.title: Disable Caching
noCache.description: Force fresh content fetching, bypassing Jina's cache. Use for real-time monitoring.

cacheTolerance.title: Cache Tolerance (seconds)
cacheTolerance.description: Maximum age of cached content (in seconds). Leave empty to use Jina's default (3600s).

waitForSelector.title: Wait For Selector
waitForSelector.description: CSS selector to wait for before extracting content (for dynamically loaded content)

jinaApiKey.title: Jina API Key (Optional)
jinaApiKey.description: Your Jina API key for higher rate limits (500 RPM vs 20 RPM). Get free key at jina.ai

batchSize.title: Batch Size
batchSize.description: Number of URLs to process concurrently. Lower values reduce rate limit issues.

maxRetries.title: Max Retries Per URL
maxRetries.description: Number of retry attempts for failed URLs
